alert.note: Alert for Bath (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 07 at 3:16PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT CENTRAL BATH COUNTY THROUGH 345 PM EDT... At 316 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Warm Springs, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor hail damage to vegetation is possible. Locations impacted include... Warm Springs... Hot Springs... Burnsville... Bacova Junction... Mountain Grove... Yost... and Williamsville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for southwestern and west central Virginia...and southeastern West Virginia.
